### Visit

## Hours & Map

**Closed Mondays, Fourth of July, Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year's Day. Closed at 2 pm on Christmas Eve.**

**Bowers Museum and Gallery Store  
** Tuesday - Sunday  
10 am - 4 pm

**Tangata Restaurant  
** Regular Hours: Tuesday - Friday 11 am - 2 pm; Saturday & Sunday 11 am - 3 pm. Reservations can be made by calling 714.550.0906. Groups of 20 or more: please contact Bowers Events [BowersEvents@patinagroup.com](mailto:BowersEvents@patinagroup.com).

**Note: The restaurant will temporarily close January 26–February 13 as management transitions from Patina Restaurant Group to Constellation Culinary Group. It will reopen February 14 under a new name, Ada’s Table.**  

**Facility Rental**  
Private events can be booked by calling 714.567.3617. Please contact Sean Zaremba email: [szaremba@bowers.org](mailto:szaremba@bowers.org)

For more information please visit [Facility Rental](/rentals) page.

**Kidseum** is closed to the public and used for select educational prep and programs.

__

2002 North Main Street, Santa Ana, CA 92706

[ __Get Direction](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Bowers+Museum/@33.7634055,-117.8707257,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m6!3m5!1s0x80dcd9b0ee8e99a5:0xcc6a99837550f6b2!8m2!3d33.7634055!4d-117.8681454!16zL20vMDdiMG5r?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI0MTEyNC4xIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D)
